definitions.text: wither, as with a loss of moisture
draw back, as with fear or pain
examples: she flinched when they showed the slaughtering of the calf
Hot water will shrink the sweater

definitions.text: decrease in size, range, or extent
examples: My courage shrivelled when I saw the task before me

definitions.text: lean and wrinkled by shrinkage as from age or illness; ; ; ; -W.F.Starkie
examples: a lanky scarecrow of a man with withered face and lantern jaws
he did well despite his withered arm
a wizened little man with frizzy grey hair

definitions.text: reduced in efficacy or vitality or intensity
examples: our shriveled receipts during the storm
as the project wore on she found her enthusiasm shriveled
